name: Happy Bird Championship
description: Hello everyone, I made this game for myself and my friends, but I decided to go public so IT IS HERE!  Beginner friendly difficulty levels starting from Easy, Medium to Hard and Insane. Very easy to start with, just touch your screen for jump and fly through those pipes to collect as many points as you can. Be the Best! Finally a beginner friendly Happy Bird Challenge to get started with from ZERO to HERO! It has a Leaderboard, Portrait and Landscape mode. This game will be Improved based on your feedback so please leave a Review, Thank You! This game is made for you so we are very appreciate your feedback and suggestions!
